Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed near Division
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Division due to a mechanical problem with a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Division due to a mechanical problem with a train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
